name: Unofficial mirrors of Extend Project's source code repositories
body:
# Welcome to the Unofficial-Extend-Project-Mirror project

## About this project
This project unofficially mirrors the source code repositories considered most important from [Extend Project](http://www.extend-project.de/)'s [Git](http://sourceforge.net/p/openfoam-extend/_list/git) and [SVN](http://sourceforge.net/p/openfoam-extend/svn/HEAD/tree/) repositories.

This has been created as an independent effort, in an attempt to avoid future situations as the one that occurred for the first part of 2013: [thread "OF 1.6-ext Repository offline?", post #2 at CFD-Online.com/Forums](http://www.cfd-online.com/Forums/openfoam-installation/111630-1-6-ext-repository-offline.html#post401396)

## License

The license for all of the source code provided in these mirrored repositories is GPL ([GNU Public License](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html)), although versions may differ depending on the mirrored source code folder/repository. Please refer to the `README*` files and source code files therein, as well as the original repositories, for more information.

## Contacts

For contacting the people at the Extend Project, please go to their pages:

  * [The OpenFOAM® Extend Project website](http://www.extend-project.de/)
  * [OpenFOAM extensions @ SourceForge.net](http://sourceforge.net/projects/openfoam-extend/)

As for this project [Unofficial-Extend-Project-Mirror](http://unofficial-extend-project-mirror.github.io/), then for reporting problems, inconsistencies, or even to request that certain repository is mirrored, please use the following issue tracker: https://github.com/Unofficial-Extend-Project-Mirror/scripts/issues

## Disclaimers

  * This offering is not approved or endorsed by OpenCFD Limited, the producer of the OpenFOAM software and owner of the OPENFOAM®  and OpenCFD®  trade marks.
  * All rights reserved to the original authors of the provided sources codes.

***

   

   

# Status report

**These mirror repositories are not yet automated.**

  

# How to recreate this mirror project

For those who wish to replicate the mirrors created here, this is the outline of the steps taken so far:

  1. On a working Linux Distribution, the commands used are provided here: [Extend-clonings.txt](https://github.com/Unofficial-Extend-Project-Mirror/scripts/blob/master/Extend-clonings.txt)

  2. Then the following script was used for hooking up the local clones of the repositories to the repositories (manually) created at Github: [associateReposToGithub.sh](https://github.com/Unofficial-Extend-Project-Mirror/scripts/blob/master/associateReposToGithub.sh)


For updating the local and remote mirrors later on:

  1. For updating the local mirrors: [pushAllRepos.sh](https://github.com/Unofficial-Extend-Project-Mirror/scripts/blob/master/pushAllRepos.sh)

  2. For then uploading the the mirrors at Github: [pullAllRepos.sh](https://github.com/Unofficial-Extend-Project-Mirror/scripts/blob/master/pullAllRepos.sh)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
